Articles.Content:
Post common problems and their Kerbal solutions:

-Public smoking: Cigarettes must include solid rocket fuel.

-Lateness: BACC-pack.

-Soda too small: Jumbo-size me.

-Duxwing

Problem: Thread in wrong sub-forum.

Solution: Thread moved.

Politics: Jebediah is now your God-King.

Crazy Cats: Send 'em to Eeloo.

Broken Computers: Mechjeb. (results may vary)

Problem: overcrowding.

Solution: experimental rocketry.

Problem: Runway covered in snow

Solution: Clear it with a mainsail.

Problem: Car often stolen.

Solution: Launch clamps.

Problem: Cut off in traffic.

Solution: Sepratron missile.

Problem: Playground boring.

Solution: Mainsail-powered carousel.

-Duxwing

Problem: kerbal don't have wings

Solution: build a giant kerbalpult (may also resolve overcrowding issues)

Problem: rocket won't fly

Solution: MOAR BOOSTERS!

Problem: Stuff costs money.

Solution: Money? What is this thing you speak of? *takes everything that isn't bolted down*

Problem: Gas prices

Solution: K-drive

Problem: Broken computer.

Solution: Send it to a space program.

Problem: airline ticket prices.

Solution: Experimental SSTOs (that don't quite make it to orbit.)

Problem: planet is about to blow.

Solution:

Problem: mouse has a hair blocking the laser.

Solution: More Boosters

problem: Game devs running low on money...

Solution: MOAR BOOSTERS

Problem: [put any problem here]

Solution: MOAR BOOSTERS!!!

Problem: Can't seem to get to (location here)

Solution(s): If in atmosphere of planet you are on, MOAR THRUST! If on a different planet and you are in orbit, MOAR DELTA-V! If on a different planet than you are on, MOAR THRUST AND DELTA-V!

Problem: Stuck in traffic and may be late.

Solution: Your car seriously lacks boosters. Add more.

Problem: due to your car with many many boosters, road casualties have sky rocketed (see what i did there?)

solution: add more boosters. pointing towards space.

Problem : Brother Jerk

Solution : Feed him some coffee, with rocket fuel in it.
